subject: Football
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning, the quarterback for the Denver Broncos, is having a record-setting season during a difficult time for the N.F.L., but his business dealings off the field are equally impressive.
snippet: Peyton Manning, the quarterback for the Denver Broncos, is having a record-setting season during a difficult time for the N.F.L., but his business dealings off the field are equally impressive.
